traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: spaced
traits.name: :spaced
traits.desc: If set to true, the corresponding direction margins will be set to 8px; It can also be set to a size in CSS units, including unit name, or one of the xs|sm|md|lg|xl predefined sizes

traits.label: inset
traits.name: :inset
traits.desc: If set to Boolean true, the left and right margins will be set to 16px. If set to 'item' then it will match a QItem's design. If set to 'item-thumbnail' then it will match the design of a QItem with a thumbnail on the left side

traits.label: vertical
traits.name: :vertical
traits.desc: If set to true, the separator will be vertical.

traits.label: size
traits.name: :size
traits.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
